channel.title: Sideways on Sriram Viswanathan
channel.description: Recent content in Sideways on Sriram Viswanathan

item.title: Sideways
item.description:
Somewhere over
In between a phase
Up and down, saying to all
This is how I see it

Going sideways
A simple motion
The colors keep praying
Please tell me more

Far today, somewhere else tomorrow
The cogs are wound too
Breathe the silence

The strain is same
Its just a part of the rain
The coldness suffers and asks
Why me?

Going sideways...
